NG0404:1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud /
NG0404:2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0404:4: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la /
NG0404:5: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang */
NG0404:6: btsun mo dam pa spyan ma la sogs pa rnams dang */
NG0404:7: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams dang */
NG0404:8: la se la sogs pa btsun mo rnams dang */
NG0404:9: dam pa'i sgo ba gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa rnams dang */
NG0404:10: de dag thams cad btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rang bzhin gyis gnas par gyur to //
NG0404:11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin //
NG0404:12: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:13: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o // // de nas
NG0404:14: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyed pa la sogs pa
NG0404:15: rnams kyis mgrin gcig pas gsol pa /
NG0404:16: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i don dam gnas gang lags /
NG0404:17: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal ba /
NG0404:18: byang chub sems kyi don nyid ni //
NG0404:19: mthong bas bltar med don nyid do //
NG0404:23: byang chub sems kyi yi ge las //
NG0404:24: mtshan dpe rnams ni lha rnams las //
NG0404:25: byang chub sems ni bsgom pa'o //
NG0404:26: chu zla'i tshul du rnam par gsal //
NG0404:27: byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni //
NG0404:28: dam pa'i skyes bu nyes pa spong *//
NG0404:29: yang dag bden pa thar pa'i mchog / byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
NG0404:30: kun 'byung lam nyid yang gnas so //
NG0404:31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:32: gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o // // de
NG0404:33: nas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol
NG0404:34: pa / byang chub sems ni rdo rje mchog / bde ba nyid kyi 'byung khung tu //
NG0404:35: byang chub sems kyi gnas nyid nas //
NG0404:36: mtshan dpe shin tu rgyan pa yi //
NG0404:37: lha rnams thabs kyis ji ltar 'byung *//
NG0404:39: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:40: yum gyi b+ha ga gzhal yas las //
NG0404:41: rdo rje rnam bzhi las bskyed pa //
NG0404:42: mkha' nyid gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang *//
NG0404:43: byang chub sems las lhar gyur ba //
NG0404:44: stong pa nyid de byang chub sems //
NG0404:45: gdags su yod pa'i skur gyur pa //
NG0404:46: yi ge rnams la rab tu byung *//
NG0404:47: brtan par shin tu red pa de //
NG0404:48: bskyed pa'i rim pa yin pa'o //
NG0404:49: de lta'i phyir na byang chub sems //
NG0404:50: sgom pa zhes par rab tu bshad //
NG0404:51: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:52: mtshan ma shin tu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ///
NG0404:53: / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
NG0404:54: bde bar gshegs pa byang chub rdo rje'i mchog / bskyed dang rdzogs pa ji ltar lags //
NG0404:55: de yi mthar phyin don gang lags //
NG0404:56: nyams su blang ba'i thabs gang lags //
NG0404:58: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:59: chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las //
NG0404:60: skad cig ma la gsal gyur pa /
NG0404:61: rdzogs dang bskyed pa zhes bya ste //
NG0404:62: 'di goms red pa lam mthar phyin //
NG0404:63: sems kyi skad cig dang po la //
NG0404:64: lus dang chos kun gnas pa'o //
NG0404:65: chos sku mkha' ltar lhar gnas pa //
NG0404:66: de la gnas pa ga la 'gyur //
NG0404:67: mi gnas pa nyid pha rol phyin //
NG0404:68: bde gshegs sa gsum rab tu gnas //
NG0404:69: snang dang mi snang dran sems med //
NG0404:70: mkha' la mkha' gnas dbyings la dbyings //
NG0404:71: mngon sum mi gnas mtshon du med //
NG0404:72: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:73: rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ///
NG0404:74: / de nas rtsol ba dang bral ba'i 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
NG0404:75: bde gshegs byang chub sems dges mchog / legs dges
NG0404:76: khyod kyis bka' stsol cig / sku mi mnga' la
NG0404:77: bdag phyag 'tshal // gsung mi mnga' la
NG0404:80: thugs la shin tu gus phyag 'tshal //
NG0404:82: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:83: nyon cig 'khor gyi bde gshegs rnams //
NG0404:84: rtsol bral don ni thugs nyid kyi //
NG0404:85: ye shes dag pa nyid yin te //
NG0404:86: dbyings la dbyings kyis bltas pas na //
NG0404:87: gang yang mthong ba med pa ni //
NG0404:88: de nyid mthong chen po yin //
NG0404:89: mkha' la mkha' nyid mkha' yi don //
NG0404:90: bgrod med pa zhes bya ba ste //
NG0404:91: bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung zheng bya //
NG0404:92: mkha' la mkha' bsam don de ni //
NG0404:93: bde gshegs rnams kyis de ma gzigs //
NG0404:94: bka' yang dag pa dpe med do //
NG0404:95: btsal na rtsol nad sangs mi srid //
NG0404:96: ma btsal ba ni ye shes rang *//
NG0404:97: phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun //
NG0404:98: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin //
NG0404:99: rang bzhin med pa'i don 'di la //
NG0404:100: rtog pa gang yang mi skye na //
NG0404:101: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin //
NG0404:102: chos sku chen po zhes bya ste //
NG0404:103: ye shes de nyid nyams su blang *//
NG0404:104: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:105: rtsol ba dang bral ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste
NG0404:106: lnga pa'o // // de bar gshegs pa rnams kyis
NG0404:107: gsol pa / byang chub sems ni 'byung ba'i rtsa //
NG0404:108: sum cu rtsa gnyis nges pa ste //
NG0404:109: rtsa yi dbye ba bka' stsal 'tshal //
NG0404:111: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bka' stsal ba /
NG0404:112: byang chub sems ni 'byung ba dang *//
NG0404:113: bde gshegs rnams ni bsti gnas sa //
NG0404:114: steng sgo rgya srubs rtsa chen bzhi //
NG0404:115: mig rtsa gnyis dang rna rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:116: lce rtsa gnyis dang sna rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:117: 'gram rtsa gnyis dang lce'u chung gnyis //
NG0404:118: nu rtsa gnyis dang mchan rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:119: dpung rtsa gnyis dang lag ngar gnyis //
NG0404:120: pho zur gnyis dang bla rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:121: rje ngar gnyis dang long rtsa gnyis //
NG0404:122: mtheb rtsa gnyis dang sum cu gnyis //
NG0404:123: byang chub sems ni dkar dmar 'bab //
NG0404:124: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:125: rtsa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ///
NG0404:126: / de nas 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
NG0404:127: byang chub sems ni rdo rje mchog / rang bzhin gnas pa bka' stsal pa /
NG0404:128: mi dmigs bde ba bka' stsol cig khyab pa chen
NG0404:129: po bka' stsol cig / nyag gcig dgongs pa bka'
NG0404:130: stsol cig / ces gsol pa dang */ bcom ldan
NG0404:131: 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bka' stsal pa
NG0404:132: / nyon cig 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs //
NG0404:133: yang dag ma bcos sems de la //
NG0404:134: ci yang ma g.yos byung ba n-i //
NG0404:135: bag chags zad de de bzhin nyid //
NG0404:136: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni //
NG0404:137: gud na yod pa ma yin no //
NG0404:138: ye nas sems nyid nam 'kha' la //
NG0404:139: snang ba med pa thams cad snang *//
NG0404:140: kun snang bde ba don dam ste //
NG0404:143: 'di las gdags pa'i chos gang med //
NG0404:144: de kho na nyid mi dmigs pa //
NG0404:145: mtshan ma'i byung tshor kun med na //
NG0404:146: dmigs med mkha' yi dbus zhes bya //
NG0404:147: kun pas bdag nyid rgyal ba'i thugs //
NG0404:148: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chen po zhes //
NG0404:149: grags dang ma grags sems med pa //
NG0404:150: e maho de nyid khyab pa ste //
NG0404:151: dmigs pa med pa'i mkha' zhes bya //
NG0404:152: dbyings la dbyings nyid rang rig na //
NG0404:153: bya btsal rdzogs pa zhes bya ste //
NG0404:154: stong pa la ni stong pa sgom //
NG0404:155: stong nyid ye shes dag pa ste //
NG0404:156: dngos dang dngos med gnyis kas stong *//
NG0404:157: ye shes dang ni dbyings ma bskyed //
NG0404:158: mkha' la mkha' bsam mkha' yi don //
NG0404:159: rang bzhin med pas lhun grub sa //
NG0404:160: ye nas skye ba med pa'i don //
NG0404:161: byang chub sems ni bsgom pa yin //
NG0404:162: ye shes rang thabs ldan pa yin //
NG0404:163: gnas med mnyam pa bag la nyal //
NG0404:164: de bzhin chung ngu'i chung ngu zhing *//
NG0404:165: de las gsum ni rang bzhin gnas //
NG0404:166: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:167: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ///
NG0404:168: / de nas 'khor gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams la /
NG0404:169: rigs kyi bu dag ces bos nas bka' stsal ba /
NG0404:170: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi //
NG0404:171: thabs chen gdams ngag rgyud mchog 'di //
NG0404:172: gsang ba'i nges don nyid yin pas //
NG0404:173: dad brtson ma yengs gsal ba'i don //
NG0404:174: byang chub sems bsgom dam pa dag / skyes bu dam pa'i don du bshad //
NG0404:175: yongs su btad pas 'chang ba dang *//
NG0404:176: klong pa dang ni don bsam pa //
NG0404:177: lha dang lha min ma lus 'dud //
NG0404:178: thams cad dngos po ma lus pa //
NG0404:179: zil gyis non par the tshom med //
NG0404:180: de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud las /
NG0404:181: 'khor la yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o
NG0404:182: // // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa zhes bya
NG0404:183: ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor dam ba rdzogs so // //
NG0404:184: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na gar+b+ha dang */
